original_solution_mapping.L1: After a year, scheme A will yield 30% of his capital which is (30/100)*$300 = $<<30/100*300=90>>90
original_solution_mapping.L2: In addition to his capital, he will have $90+$300 = $<<90+300=390>>390 in scheme A
original_solution_mapping.L3: After a year, scheme B will yield 50% of his capital which is (50/100)*$200 = $<<50*.01*200=100>>100
original_solution_mapping.L4: In addition to his capital, he will have $100+$200 = $<<100+200=300>>300 in scheme B
original_solution_mapping.L5: After a year, he will have $390-$300 = $<<390-300=90>>90 in scheme A more than in scheme B

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5513.
    Returns: the difference in money between scheme A and scheme B after a year.
    """
    # L1
    scheme_a_yield_percent_num = 30 # 30% of the capital
    percent_divisor = 100 # WK
    scheme_a_capital = 300 # invested $300 in scheme A
    scheme_a_yield = (scheme_a_yield_percent_num / percent_divisor) * scheme_a_capital

    # L2
    total_scheme_a = scheme_a_yield + scheme_a_capital

    # L3
    scheme_b_yield_percent_num = 50 # 50% of the capital
    percent_factor = 0.01 # WK
    scheme_b_capital = 200 # invested $200 in B
    scheme_b_yield = scheme_b_yield_percent_num * percent_factor * scheme_b_capital

    # L4
    total_scheme_b = scheme_b_yield + scheme_b_capital

    # L5
    difference_a_b = total_scheme_a - total_scheme_b

    # FA
    answer = difference_a_b
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: After a year, scheme A will yield 30% of his capital which is ({scheme_a_yield_percent_num}/{percent_divisor})*${scheme_a_capital} = ${scheme_a_yield}<<{scheme_a_yield_percent_num}/{percent_divisor}*{scheme_a_capital}={scheme_a_yield}>>{scheme_a_yield}
In addition to his capital, he will have ${scheme_a_yield}+${scheme_a_capital} = ${total_scheme_a}<<{scheme_a_yield}+{scheme_a_capital}={total_scheme_a}>>{total_scheme_a} in scheme A

After a year, scheme B will yield 50% of his capital which is (50/100)*${scheme_b_capital} = ${scheme_b_yield}<<{scheme_b_yield_percent_num}*{percent_factor}*{scheme_b_capital}={scheme_b_yield}>>{scheme_b_yield}
In addition to his capital, he will have ${scheme_b_yield}+${scheme_b_capital} = ${total_scheme_b}<<{scheme_b_yield}+{scheme_b_capital}={total_scheme_b}>>{total_scheme_b} in scheme B
After a year, he will have ${total_scheme_a}-${total_scheme_b} = ${difference_a_b}<<{total_scheme_a}-{total_scheme_b}={difference_a_b}>>{difference_a_b} in scheme A more than in scheme B

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: In addition to his capital, he will have $90+$300 = $390<<90+300=390>>390 in scheme A

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: In addition to his capital, he will have $30+$200 = $230<<30+200=230>>230 in scheme B

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'scheme_a_yield_percent_num' (value: 30) was used instead of 'scheme_b_yield' (value: 100.0).
